results.description: County champions Essex will play the MCC at Galle in Sri Lanka in the domestic season's traditional curtain-raiser in March.
results.shortTitle: Champions Essex to play MCC in Sri Lanka
results.title: Champion County match: Essex to play MCC in Sri Lanka in March

results.description: Essex fast bowler Sam Cook pens a new contract with the county champions, tying him to Chelmsford until 2022.
results.shortTitle: New contract for Essex paceman Cook
results.title: Sam Cook: Essex fast bowler signs extended contract with county champions

thumbnail.altText: Sam Cook took 32 wickets in nine matches in 2019 as Essex won the County Championship for the second time in three years

results.description: Essex captain Ryan ten Doeschate signs a new one-year deal with the county champions.
results.shortTitle: Ten Doeschate signs new Essex deal
results.title: Ryan ten Doeschate: Essex captain signs new one-year contract

results.description: Former England all-rounder Ravi Bopara ends an 18-year association with county champions Essex to join Sussex.
results.shortTitle: Bopara leaves champions Essex for Sussex
results.title: Ravi Bopara: Essex all-rounder joins Sussex after 18 years

results.description: Feroze Khushi, Aron Nijjar, Shane Snater and Paul Walter all sign contract extensions with County Championship winners Essex.
results.shortTitle: Essex quartet extend contracts
results.title: Essex: Feroze Khushi, Aron Nijjar, Shane Snater and Paul Walter extend deals

thumbnail.altText: Aron Nijjar in action for Essex Eagles

results.description: Essex spinner Simon Harmer is named County Championship Player of the Year, while Somerset's Tom Banton wins the young cricketer award.
results.shortTitle: Harmer & Banton pick up writers' awards
results.title: Cricket Writers' Club awards: Simon Harmer and Tom Banton pick up accolades

results.description: With the 2019 county cricket season over, keep up to date with the latest signings, departures and rumours for 2020.
results.shortTitle: County ins and outs
results.title: County ins & outs - signings, departures and rumours

thumbnail.altText: Miguel Cummins has ended his West Indies career to join Middlesex as a Kolpak player

results.description: Alastair Cook says he will play for one more season "at least" after helping Essex to a second County Championship in three years.
results.shortTitle: Cook to play another year 'at least'
results.title: Essex win County Championship: Alastair Cook to play 'at least' one more year

results.description: Essex are crowned county champions, while Somerset miss out again as the title decider ends in a dramatic draw at Taunton.
results.shortTitle: Essex win 2019 County Championship
results.title: Essex win County Championship: Draw with Somerset confirms 2019 title

thumbnail.altText: Essex opener Alastair Cook with the County Championship trophy

results.description: England all-rounder Ben Stokes is one of four players nominated for the Players' Player of the Year by the Professional Cricketers' Association.
results.shortTitle: Stokes up for Players' Player of the Year
results.title: Ben Stokes: England all-rounder one of four nominated for Players' Player of the Year

results.description: Essex are set to win their eighth County Championship as a day three washout means their game with Somerset should end in a draw.
results.shortTitle: Essex close in on title after washout
results.title: County Championship: Essex close to title after day three washout at Taunton

results.description: Somerset keep their title hopes alive as a last-wicket stand of 59 takes them past 200 against Essex on a second rain-hit day.
results.shortTitle: Somerset cling on to title hopes
results.title: County Championship: Somerset edge past 200 against Essex

results.description: Ticket sales in English Twenty20 cricket soar in 2019 - and it's not just down to England winning the Cricket World Cup.
results.shortTitle: T20 ticket sales reach new peak in 2019
results.title: T20 Blast: Booming English ticket sales reach new peak in 2019 World Cup year

results.description: With the county season just about finished for 2019, who did BBC Sport users choose as their best Championship XI?
results.shortTitle: Who is in your county team of the season?
results.title: County Championship: 2019 team of the season as chosen by BBC Sport users

results.description: Rain washes out the final two sessions of Somerset's title decider against Essex, with the hosts struggling on 75-4 at Taunton.
results.shortTitle: Somerset struggling against Essex
results.title: County Championship: Somerset slump to 75-4 against Essex before rain arrives

results.description: Essex skipper Simon Harmer acclaims Ravi Bopara as one of the best "finishers" in world cricket after their T20 Blast triumph.
results.shortTitle: Bopara 'one of best T20 finishers' - Harmer
results.title: Ravi Bopara: Essex batsman labelled one of world's best 'finishers' after Blast win

results.description: Somerset and Essex will go head-to-head to win the County Championship title from Monday at Taunton.
results.shortTitle: Somerset & Essex set for Championship decider
results.title: County Championship: Somerset and Essex set for Taunton title decider

thumbnail.altText: Tom Abell and Ryan ten Doeschate

results.description: Listen to BBC Radio commentary from four fixtures in County Championship Division One.
results.shortTitle: Listen: County Championship Division One commentaries
results.title: Listen to County Championship Division One commentaries

results.description: Simon Harmer puts in a man-of-the-match performance with three wickets and three late boundaries as Essex Eagles lift the T20 trophy for the first time.
results.shortTitle: Highlights: Harmer inspires Essex Eagles to T20 Blast final win
results.title: T20 Blast final highlights: Simon Harmer leads Essex Eagles to win over Worcestershire Rapids

results.description: Essex Eagles beat Worcestershire Rapids by four wickets to win the T20 Blast for the first time in their history.
results.shortTitle: Essex beat Worcs to win maiden T20 Blast
results.title: T20 Blast final: Essex Eagles beat Worcestershire Rapids to win title for first time
